articles.author: David Adler
articles.title: Shohei Ohtani's MVP win celebrated with Tokyo Tower lights - MLB.com
articles.description:
The Tokyo Tower in Japan was lit up in bright Angels colors Friday to celebrate Shohei Ohtani's 2021 American League MVP Award.
At 5:17 p.m. in Tokyo -- that's 17:17, in honor of Ohtani's jersey No. 17 -- the tower shone bright red and displayed a congratulat…
